about-us.title: About Us
about-us.subtitle: Passionate breeders of Shar Pei puppies with love and dedication.

philosophy.title: Our Breeding Philosophy
philosophy.text: We believe in responsible and ethical breeding, ensuring that every puppy grows up in a loving and well-socialized environment.

history.title: Our History
history.text: Our journey began years ago with a deep admiration for the Shar Pei breed. Over time, we have refined our breeding techniques to prioritize health, temperament, and structure.

examinations.title: Health Examinations
examinations.diseases: Screening for common hereditary and infectious diseases.
examinations.deworming: Regular deworming and parasite prevention treatments.

vaccination.title: Vaccinations
vaccination.description: All puppies receive up-to-date vaccinations following veterinary guidelines.

guarantees.title: Health Guarantees
guarantees.description: We provide a health guarantee covering hereditary diseases and initial adaptation.

returns.title: Returns & Policies
returns.description: If you experience unforeseen health issues, we offer support and possible returns.

research.title: Research
research.description: Learn about the breed and ensure it's a good fit for your lifestyle.

application.title: Application
application.description: Fill out an adoption application to start the process.

interview.title: Interview
interview.description: We will contact you for a short interview.

home_visit.title: Home Visit
home_visit.description: A home check may be required to ensure a safe environment.

approval.title: Approval
approval.description: Once approved, you will be notified to proceed.

meet_dog.title: Meet the Dog
meet_dog.description: Schedule a visit to meet your potential new pet.

finalize.title: Finalize & Welcome Home
finalize.description: Complete the paperwork and bring your new companion home!

faqs.q1: How do I adopt a dog?
faqs.a1: To adopt, visit our 'Available Dogs' page and click 'Adopt' to start the process.
faqs.a2: After selecting a dog, fill out an adoption application. Our team will review it and contact you for the next steps.
faqs.a3: Yes, all our dogs receive vaccinations and a health check before adoption.
faqs.q4: Can I meet the dog before adopting?
faqs.a4: Yes! We encourage visits to meet the dog and ensure a good match before finalizing adoption.
